languages.text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Блюститель быстро ставит огнемет на предохранитель и отводит форсунку в сторону.{/n} "Чем могу служить?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Блюститель быстро ставит огнемет на предохранитель и отводит форсунку в сторону.{/n} "Чем могу служить?"

languages.text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан!" {n}Блюститель быстро ставит огнемет на предохранитель и отводит форсунку в сторону.{/n} "Чем могу служить?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamethrower and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"
"Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamethrower and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"
"Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamethrower and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"
"Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"
"Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán!». {n}El guardia acciona rápidamente el seguro del lanzallamas y desvía la bocacha lejos de ti.{/n} «¿En qué puedo servirle?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán!». {n}El guardia acciona rápidamente el seguro del lanzallamas y desvía la bocacha lejos de ti.{/n} «¿En qué puedo servirle?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}エンフォーサーは素早くフレイマーの安全装置をかけ、ノズルをあなたから遠ざけた。{/n}「ご用件は？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！」{n}エンフォーサーは素早くフレイマーの安全装置をかけ、ノズルをあなたから遠ざけた。{/n}「ご用件は？」

languages.text: “舰长大人！”{n}执法者立刻激活了火焰喷射器的安全装置，同时将喷嘴指向远离你的方向。{/n}“有什么需要我效劳的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人！”{n}执法者立刻激活了火焰喷射器的安全装置，同时将喷嘴指向远离你的方向。{/n}“有什么需要我效劳的吗？”

languages.text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Der Enforcer sichert eilig den Flammenwerfer und wendet seine Mündung von dir ab.{/n}"Wie kann ich Euch dienen?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}Der Enforcer sichert eilig den Flammenwerfer und wendet seine Mündung von dir ab.{/n}"Wie kann ich Euch dienen?"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! {n}Le prévôt referme à la hâte le capuchon de sécurité de son lance-flammes et détourne la gueule de l'arme de votre personne.{/n} Que puis-je faire pour vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! {n}Le prévôt referme à la hâte le capuchon de sécurité de son lance-flammes et détourne la gueule de l'arme de votre personne.{/n} Que puis-je faire pour vous ? »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan!" {n}İnfazcı, alevsaçanının emniyetini süratle açarak silahın ağzını senden başka bir yöne doğrultuyor.{/n} "Size nasıl hizmet edebilirim?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain!" {n}The enforcer quickly puts the safety on the flamer and points the nozzle away from you.{/n} "How may I serve you?"
